results.title: Evaluation of Amlodipine and Imipramine Efficacy to Treat Galleria mellonella Infection by Biofilm-Producing and Antimicrobial-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
results.text_hl: Evaluation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Imipramine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007099 @@@Imipramine@@@ Efficacy to Treat @SPECIES_7137 @@@Galleria mellonella@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@Infection@@@ by Biofilm-Producing and Antimicrobial-Resistant @SPECIES_1280 @@@Staphylococcus aureus@@@.

results.title: Amlodipine Increases the Therapeutic Potential of Ravuconazole upon Trypanosoma cruzi Infection.
results.text_hl: In this study, we evaluated the effect of @CHEMICAL_ER_30346 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C104066 @@@ravuconazole@@@, an EBI, combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, a calcium channel blocker, upon @SPECIES_5693 @@@Trypanosoma cruzi@@@ experimental @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Machado YA, Bahia MT, Caldas IS, Mazzeti AL, Novaes RD, Vilas Boas BR, Santos LJS, Martins-Filho OA, Marques MJ, Diniz LF. Amlodipine Increases the Therapeutic Potential of Ravuconazole upon Trypanosoma cruzi Infection. Antimicrob Agents Chemother. 2020 Jul 22;64(8):. PMID: 32423960

results.title: Pain Management Options in a Patient with Livedoid Vasculopathy and Peripheral Neuropathy
results.journal: Eur J Case Rep Intern Med
results.text_hl: Hence, he was later treated with @CHEMICAL_Epoprostenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011464 @@@epoprostenol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ for vasodilation, @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroids@@@ for any possible @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, and antibiotics to treat superimposed @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Palanisamy N, Chinnappan J, Bachuwa G. Pain Management Options in a Patient with Livedoid Vasculopathy and Peripheral Neuropathy Eur J Case Rep Intern Med. 2023;10(1):003727. PMID: 36819654

results.title: Transdermal application of azithromycin-amlodipine-heparin gel enhances survival of infected random ischaemic flap.
results.text_hl: Transdermal application of @CHEMICAL_Azithromycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017963 @@@azithromycin@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Heparin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006493 @@@heparin@@@ gel enhances survival of @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infected@@@ random @DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ flap.

results.title: Potential role of the cardiovascular non-antibiotic (helper compound) amlodipine in the treatment of microbial infections: scope and hope for the future.
results.text_hl: The present review focuses on the possible use of cardiovascular non-antibiotics such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@AML@@@ as auxiliary compound targets for synergistic combinations in @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infections@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ conditions, rationalised on the basis of the activities of the compounds.

citations.NLM: Mazumdar K, Asok Kumar K, Dutta NK. Potential role of the cardiovascular non-antibiotic (helper compound) amlodipine in the treatment of microbial infections: scope and hope for the future. Int J Antimicrob Agents. 2010 Oct;36(4):295-302. PMID: 20591629
citations.BibTeX: @article{20591629, title={Potential role of the cardiovascular non-antibiotic (helper compound) amlodipine in the treatment of microbial infections: scope and hope for the future.}, author={Mazumdar K and Asok Kumar K and Dutta NK}, journal={Int J Antimicrob Agents}, volume={36}, number={4}, pages={295-302}}

results.title: Acid sphingomyelinase inhibitors normalize pulmonary ceramide and inflammation in cystic fibrosis.
results.journal: Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol
results.text_hl: Inhalation of the @GENE_SMPD1 @GENE_20597 @@@Asm@@@ inhibitors @CHEMICAL_Amitriptyline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000639 @@@amitriptyline@@@, @CHEMICAL_Trimipramine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014299 @@@trimipramine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Desipramine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003891 @@@desipramine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Chlorprothixene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002749 @@@chlorprothixene@@@, @CHEMICAL_Fluoxetine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005473 @@@fluoxetine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Sertraline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020280 @@@sertraline@@@ restored normal @CHEMICAL_Ceramides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002518 @@@ceramide@@@ concentrations in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ bronchial epithelial cells, reduced @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in the lung of CF @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and prevented @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ with @SPECIES_287 @@@Pseudomonas aeruginosa@@@.

citations.NLM: Becker KA, Riethmüller J, Lüth A, Döring G, Kleuser B, Gulbins E. Acid sphingomyelinase inhibitors normalize pulmonary ceramide and inflammation in cystic fibrosis. Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol. 2010 Jun;42(6):716-24. PMID: 19635928
citations.BibTeX: @article{19635928, title={Acid sphingomyelinase inhibitors normalize pulmonary ceramide and inflammation in cystic fibrosis.}, author={Becker KA and Riethmüller J and Lüth A and Döring G and Kleuser B and Gulbins E}, journal={Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol}, volume={42}, number={6}, pages={716-24}}
